```{r}
library(tidyverse)

```

```{r}
desc <- read_csv("data/desc_all.csv")
```

```{r}
desc %>%
  distinct(Code, group_name)

  ggplot(aes(y = no_categories)) +
  geom_histogram(binwidth = 1,
                 color = "white")
```
